item.title: Trump touts short-term deal with China after Xi meeting
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is reducing some tariffs on Chinese imports following a meeting in South Korea with Chinese President Xi Jinping.

item.title: Americans largely oppose Trump tearing down White House East Wing for ballroom: Poll
item.description: The poll found 45% of respondents "strongly" oppose the East Wing demolition.

item.title: China says it's on track to land astronauts on the moon by 2030
